choose_account.title: Choose an account
choose_account.subtitle: Select a recent account on this device. Or sign in with another account.
choose_account.continue_subtitle: Choose an account to continue securely.
choose_account.no_sessions_desc: This device has no saved EVzone sessions. Sign in to continue.
choose_account.remove_desc: This removes the local session for this account. You can still sign in later using your credentials.
choose_account.terms_policy: By continuing, you agree to EVzone Terms and acknowledge the Privacy Policy.
choose_account.copyright: © {{year}} EVzone Group. Secure sign-in across EVzone platforms.

sign_in.title: Sign In
sign_in.subtitle: Sign in to continue
sign_in.one_account_title: One account for all EVzone platforms
sign_in.one_account_desc: Sign in once and continue securely across EVzone apps.
sign_in.secure_sessions_desc: Protected login with strong session controls.
sign_in.passkeys_desc: Sign in with your device lock. Phishing-resistant.
sign_in.privacy_first_desc: Minimal data sharing and clear permissions.
sign_in.form_subtitle: Use passkey, Google/Apple, or email/phone and password.
sign_in.setup_passkeys_later: You can set up passkeys later in Security
sign_in.otp_fallback: If the passkey prompt does not appear, use password or OTP.
sign_in.use_otp_desc: Sign in with a one-time code sent to your email or phone.
sign_in.terms_agreement: By signing in, you agree to EVzone Terms and acknowledge the Privacy Policy.

sign_up.title: Create an account
sign_up.subtitle: Create an account
sign_up.account_creation_desc: This creates your EVzone account. Each module will handle its own onboarding after you sign in.
sign_up.secure_identity_desc: One login for all EVzone platforms.
sign_up.clear_permissions_desc: You can manage access later in My Accounts.
sign_up.form_subtitle: Create your EVzone identity. You will verify your email or phone in the next step.
sign_up.create_otp_desc: Use a verification code instead of setting a password now.
sign_up.password_hint: Use at least 8 characters. Mix letters, numbers, and symbols for stronger security.
sign_up.otp_info: You will verify your email or phone with a one-time code. You can set a password later in Security Settings.
sign_up.invite_code_placeholder: Enter code if you have one
sign_up.terms_checkbox: I agree to the EVzone Terms and Privacy Policy
sign_up.next_step_verification: Next step: verification. This is account creation, not module onboarding.

forgot_password.title: Forgot password
forgot_password.subtitle: Enter your email or phone number and choose how to receive reset instructions.
forgot_password.reset_access_desc: We will send password reset instructions to your verified email or phone.
forgot_password.rate_limiting_desc: Requests may be limited to protect against abuse.
forgot_password.secure_link_desc: Reset tokens expire quickly and can’t be reused.
forgot_password.sent_instructions: We sent reset instructions to {{identifier}} via {{method}}.
forgot_password.next_desc: Follow the link or enter the code to reset your password.
forgot_password.email_link_desc: Send a secure reset link to your email.
forgot_password.sms_code_desc: Send a reset code to your phone.
forgot_password.whatsapp_code_desc: Send a reset code via WhatsApp.
forgot_password.phone_methods_hint: Phone methods are available when you enter a phone number.
forgot_password.tip_spam: Tip: If you don’t receive anything, check spam folders (email) or ensure network coverage (phone).
forgot_password.confirm_info: If this account exists, you will receive reset instructions shortly.
forgot_password.validation_email_phone: Enter your email or phone number.
forgot_password.validation_valid_email_phone: Enter a valid email address or phone number.
forgot_password.validation_captcha: Please complete the verification checkbox to continue.

reset_password.title: Reset password
reset_password.subtitle: Verify your reset link token or use an OTP code.
reset_password.create_new_password_desc: Reset tokens and OTPs are short-lived for your security.
reset_password.token_helper: Paste the token from your email reset link.
reset_password.email_phone_helper: Enter a valid email or phone.
reset_password.channel_email_desc: Receive the OTP in your email inbox.
reset_password.channel_sms_desc: Receive the OTP as an SMS.
reset_password.channel_whatsapp_desc: Receive the OTP in WhatsApp chat.
reset_password.phone_channels_hint: Phone channels are available when you enter a phone number.
reset_password.password_updated_desc: Your password has been reset. You can sign in now.
reset_password.validation_token_empty: Enter the reset token from your email link.
reset_password.validation_token_invalid: Invalid or expired token. Try requesting a new reset link.
reset_password.success_token_verified: Token verified. Set a new password.
reset_password.validation_email_phone_empty: Enter your email or phone number.
reset_password.validation_email_phone_invalid: Enter a valid email address or phone number.
reset_password.validation_email_only: Email delivery is only available for email identifiers.
reset_password.validation_phone_only: SMS/WhatsApp delivery is only available for phone identifiers.
reset_password.otp_sent_email: Reset OTP sent via Email. Demo code: 444444
reset_password.otp_sent_sms: Reset OTP sent via SMS. Demo code: 444444
reset_password.otp_sent_whatsapp: Reset OTP sent via WhatsApp. Demo code: 555555
reset_password.success_otp_verified: OTP verified. Set a new password.
reset_password.success_reset_signout: Password reset. All devices signed out (demo).

verify_email.title: Verify email
verify_email.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to {{email}}.
verify_email.sent_code: We sent a 6-digit verification code to {{email}}. Enter it here to continue.
verify_email.resend_desc: You can resend after the cooldown.
verify_email.email_verified_desc: Your email {{email}} is verified. You can now continue.
verify_email.next_steps_desc: Continue to verify phone or set your password.
verify_email.dialog_change_email_desc: Update your email address. We will send a new verification code.
verify_email.info_open_email: Open email app (demo). Check your inbox for the verification code.

verify_phone.title: Verify your phone
verify_phone.choose_method_desc: Select how you want to receive your verification code.
verify_phone.resend_desc: You can resend after the cooldown.
verify_phone.safe_verification_desc: Your phone helps protect your account.
verify_phone.success_verified_desc: Your phone {{phone}} is verified. You can now continue.
verify_phone.next_steps_desc: Continue to set your password or enable 2FA.
verify_phone.enter_code_desc: Enter the 6-digit code sent via {{channel}} to {{phone}}.
verify_phone.dialog_change_phone_desc: Update your phone number. We will send a new code via {{channel}}.

set_password.title: Set a password
set_password.subtitle: Create a password for your EVzone account.
set_password.create_strong_desc: Use a unique password to keep your EVzone account secure.
set_password.requirements_desc: Aim for a strong score before continuing.
set_password.next_2fa_desc: For extra security, enable 2FA after setting your password.
set_password.passkey_teaser_desc: Passkeys let you sign in using Face ID, fingerprint, or device security.
set_password.passkey_info: You can enable a passkey anytime in Security Settings.
set_password.next_steps_footer: Next: optional 2FA setup or redirect back to the requesting app.
set_password.strength_tip: A stronger password reduces the risk of unauthorized access.
set_password.validation_strengthen: Please strengthen your password before continuing.
set_password.success_set: Password set successfully. Next: 2FA setup or continue to app.

account_recovery.title: Account recovery help
account_recovery.subtitle: Account recovery help
account_recovery.section_quick_actions_desc: Use these shortcuts to get back into your account quickly.
account_recovery.alert_compromised: If you suspect your account is compromised, reset your password and enable MFA immediately.
account_recovery.section_troubleshooting_desc: Choose the issue that matches your situation.
account_recovery.footer_troubleshooting: If none of the options apply, contact support and provide the email/phone you used on your account.
help_no_email_bullets: Confirm the email address is correct.
If you used a phone number, try SMS or WhatsApp instead.
help_phone_changed_bullets: Try using your email to reset your password.
If you no longer have access to the email, use Account Recovery with support.
Have a document or proof ready if support requests verification.
help_lost_mfa_bullets: Use a recovery code if you saved them.
If you don’t have recovery codes, contact support.
After login, regenerate recovery codes and enable MFA again.
help_locked_out_bullets: Wait for the timer to expire, then try again.
Avoid repeated requests to prevent blocking.
If this persists, contact support with your identifier (email/phone).
account_recovery.dialog_support_desc: Share the email/phone you used, and what happened. For security, do not share your password.

recovery_code.subtitle: Recovery code
recovery_code.title: Use a recovery code
recovery_code.desc: Recovery codes are single-use backups when you can’t access your authenticator, SMS, or email.
recovery_code.where_find_1: The list you downloaded when enabling MFA
recovery_code.alert_single_use: Each recovery code can be used only once.
recovery_code.alert_regenerate: Strongly recommended: regenerate your recovery codes now. This used code is no longer valid.
recovery_code.next_steps_desc: Generate a fresh list of recovery codes and store them safely.
recovery_code.enter_code_desc: Type a single-use recovery code from your saved list.
recovery_code.helper_code: Tip: Codes are case-insensitive. Hyphens are optional.
recovery_code.link_cant_access: I can’t access my recovery codes
recovery_code.validation_invalid: Invalid recovery code. Try another code from your list.

mfa.subtitle: Multi-factor authentication
mfa.challenge_desc: For your security, we require a second step to confirm it’s really you signing in.
mfa.feature_protection_desc: MFA blocks most account takeover attempts.
mfa.feature_options_desc: Use Authenticator, SMS, WhatsApp, or Email OTP.
mfa.checkbox_trust_desc: You will be prompted less often on this device.
mfa.demo_codes_hint: Demo codes: Authenticator 654321, SMS 222222, WhatsApp 333333, Email 111111
mfa.enter_code_desc: Choose a method and enter the 6-digit code.
mfa.help_totp: Open your authenticator app and enter the current code.
mfa.help_sms: Send a code to your phone number, then enter it here.
mfa.help_whatsapp: Send a code to your WhatsApp number, then enter it here.
mfa.help_email: Send a code to your email address, then enter it here.
mfa.validation_too_many_attempts_timer: Too many attempts. Try again in {{seconds}}s.
mfa.validation_locked: Too many failed attempts. Locked for 30 seconds.
mfa.dialog_method_auth_desc: Get a code from your mobile auth app.
mfa.dialog_method_sms_desc: Get a code sent to your phone via SMS.
mfa.dialog_method_whatsapp_desc: Get a code sent to your WhatsApp.
mfa.dialog_method_email_desc: Get a code sent to your email address.

passkey.subtitle: Passkey sign-in
passkey.title: Sign in
passkey.desc: Use a passkey (recommended) or sign in with password.
passkey.alert_phishing: Passkeys protect against phishing. Use your device lock to continue.
passkey.hint_no_passkey: If you do not have a passkey on this device, you can use your phone or switch to password.
passkey.footer_terms: By continuing, you agree to EVzone’s Terms and Privacy Policy.
passkey.validation_no_support: Passkeys are not supported on this device/browser.
passkey.error_cancelled: {{error}}: passkey prompt was cancelled or not allowed in this environment.

re_auth.subtitle: Re-authentication
re_auth.subtitle_security_desc: Before we proceed with {{action}}, please confirm your identity again.
re_auth.feature_fraud_desc: Confirms it’s you on sensitive actions.
re_auth.feature_short_lived_desc: This prompt only applies for this action.
re_auth.demo_hint: Demo password: EVzone123! • MFA codes: Authenticator 654321, SMS 222222, Email 111111
re_auth.desc_confirm_identity: Choose one method: password or MFA code.
